body:
## Update for vs debugging call stack

```
 	vrfcore.dll!_VerifierStopMessageEx()	Unknown
 	vfbasics.dll!_AVrfpFreeMemLockChecks@16()	Unknown
 	vfbasics.dll!_AVrfpFreeMemNotify@16()	Unknown
 	vfbasics.dll!_AVrfpHeapFree@12()	Unknown
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!_free_base(void * block) line 107	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!free_dbg_nolock(void * const block, const int block_use) line 985	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!_free_dbg(void * block, int block_use) line 1011	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!free(void * block) line 16	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!gpr_free(void * p) line 77	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!grpc_resource_quota_unref_internal(grpc_resource_quota * resource_quota) line 668	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!ru_destroy(void * ru, grpc_error * error) line 577	C++
>	channel_demo_ex.exe!grpc_combiner_continue_exec_ctx() line 260	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!grpc_core::ExecCtx::Flush() line 137	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!pollset_work(grpc_pollset * pollset, grpc_pollset_worker * * worker_hdl, __int64 deadline) line 132	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!grpc_pollset_work(grpc_pollset * pollset, grpc_pollset_worker * * worker, __int64 deadline) line 48	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!cq_next(grpc_completion_queue * cq, gpr_timespec deadline, void * reserved) line 1039	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!grpc_completion_queue_next(grpc_completion_queue * cq, gpr_timespec deadline, void * reserved) line 1115	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!grpc::CompletionQueue::AsyncNextInternal(void * * tag, bool * ok, gpr_timespec deadline) line 56	C++
 	channel_demo_ex.exe!grpc::CompletionQueue::Next(void * * tag, bool * ok) line 171	C++
```

Although this issue was fixed, how to test issue like this is the problem. Does anyone have any idea?
The fix #17586 is going to be in the upcoming v1.18.0 release https://github.com/grpc/grpc/blob/master/doc/grpc_release_schedule.md
